name: deviceTemperatureSetting_setValue
description: This function is used to set the temperature of a specified SmartThings device or its compartment.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to be used to set the temperature on.

parameters.name: compartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to set the temperature on.

parameters.name: temperatureUnit
parameters.description: The unit of temperature to be used.
